mapper.sql: id, file_name, pattern, big_pattern, content_type, create_by, file_kind, file_size, file_type, length, md5_code, real_name, save_path, transfer_path, zone_path_id, turn_status, main_id, status, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select: SELECT z.path, f.save_path,f.file_name,f.file_type FROM m_base_file f INNER JOIN m_zone_path z ON f.zone_path_id = z.id WHERE f.id =#{id}
SELECT z.view_path,f.big_pattern FROM m_base_file f INNER JOIN m_zone_path z ON f.zone_path_id = z.id WHERE f.id =#{id}
SELECT z.virtual_path,f.transfer_path FROM m_base_file f INNER JOIN m_zone_path z ON f.zone_path_id = z.id WHERE f.id =#{id}
SELECT f.pattern AS pattern ,f.zone_path_id AS zonePathId FROM m_base_file f WHERE f.main_id =#{baseFileId} ORDER BY f.id ASC

update m_base_file set file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pattern = #{pattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, big_pattern = #{bigPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_type = #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_kind = #{fileKind,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length = #{length,jdbcType=BIGINT}, md5_code = #{md5Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, save_path = #{savePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transfer_path = #{transferPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zone_path_id = #{zonePathId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, turn_status = #{turnStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, main_id = #{mainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
